questions.quote: Hello, Jerry.  Tim couldn't make it, he's in love.  Isn't that wonderful?
Well, I gotta say that I think that that is a fantastic idea, Feldman!
So you see, Kramer took it upon himself to say hi to you from me. When in fact it was an unauthorised hi.
Gone.  The tenant association made me give it to this guy because he was an Andrea Doria survivor..
I'm not taking a soak in that human bacteria frat you got goin' there.
Her father is so religious, I'm just amazed that he's letting you see her again after that Schindler's List make-out session.
Yeah. Well, let's hurry up and eat I gotta get out of here. I'm meeting a woman for a drink.
All right Jerry. But I can figure it out myself any way you want.
What happened to the scotch tape? Who takes the scotch tape? Nobody returns anything around here.
That's another loop hole. That's two dates without asking you out.
